job_description:
• Experience in other PCS subjects is a plus.
• Fault Detection and Classification (FDC), Run-to-Run Control (R2R), Scheduling or Sampling, Process Metrology, and semiconductor process equipment interfaces A BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Physics, or a related field, or an equivalent Micron job standing of Engineer or higher is required.
• New College Grad - ATE Process Engineer ID1Boise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 2 days ago 1-2 years of experience with analytical problem-solving and data analysis skills 1-2 years of experience developing, teaching, and presenting technical subjects 1-2 years of exposure to SPC through either academia or direct work experience 1-2 years of experience balancing multiple high priority projects Semiconductor process knowledge Global Quality Process Control System (PCS) Senior EngineerTaichung City, Taichung City, Taiwan + 2 morePosted 2 months ago Intern - Metrology Process Development EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 2 months ago.
